item.description:
This group has enjoyed tea at Heath's Tea room in the past. On Saturday June 1, they are having a photo and tea event - a professional photographer will take individual portraits (you can choose a 5x7 print or a digital photo) and attendees will get 3 tea sandwiches, a scone with fixings, and choice of tea.  All for $35.  If you need a photo for your website, biz card, or your facebook or Linked In page, this is a good opportunity. Let's get dolled up and have some tea and photos.

YOU MUST SIGN UP AND PAY IN ADVANCE - SAYING YOU ARE COMING ON THE MEETUP SITE DOES NOT SIGN YOU UP FOR THIS EVENT.

To reserve your spot email heath@heathstearoom.com or call 978-309-3388
item.how_to_find_us: The place is small so I don't think you can miss us -

group.name: Women Supporting Women Through Life's Incredible Journeys

item.name: Photo-Op and Tea at Heath's Tea Room in Rockport
